jobTitle: RA42: Software Engineer Intern (Pending for Closing)
jobDescription: The main duties of the Intern are as follows:  1. 2 Data Analysts: Help us prepare the large data sets in Metrology and Guided Inspection area and help our data  scientist polish the incoming data.  2. 2 Deep learning Research Interns: help us explore the cutting edge academic/industry development and writing  summaries regarding to resources/courses/papers etc in deep learning areas.  3. 2 Image Processing Interns: help us explore the cutting edge academic/industry development and writing  summaries regarding to resources/courses/papers etc in basic image processing areas.  4. 2 ISO Audit/CMMI/eManager Interns:  5. The interns will help us do quality assurance as well as documents writing in the list areas.  6. Help our engineers as a supplements as well as bringing their thoughts so they could benefits us in the long way. Requirements Master/PhD students after their first year of the course work. C++/C#/Python Coding experience preferred.
